svcsubproc.title: Side Traffic Stop Arm
svcsubproc.para: Driver side stop arm signs are located at the forward portion of the bus body under the driver side window. These signs are electrically or air operated with flashing warning lights facing forward with a large reflective stop sign. The warning lights on the safety arm may vary in the type of lights required by the local district or state standard. An Optional air operated safety arm is available.

svcsubproc.para: An optional rear stop arm may be specified ( Fig. 44). This stop arm is located on the rear street side of the bus body with the warning light and sign face facing the rear of the bus when activated.
